metadata.name: MOMENTS IN PAHREAH
metadata.description:
Moments in Pahreah

A moment in time, capturing unique desert textures  
that have remained unseen to the masses.  
My passion runs wild when I photograph desert textures,  
a style that's craving to take off in the world of art.  
Nestled in a current ghost town, founded in 1870  
under the name of Pahreah, later renamed to Paria.

This image continues to baffle me with the alien-like textures  
and patterns, and the canals that create depth in the landscape.

I chose to use this image as an edition for it's complete unique imagery 
as there is nothing like it in the current market. I believe by opening up my best artwork at a low entry price, it will be my next stepping stone into becoming the well known artist I dream of achieving. 

My art is my best representation of my life and my passion
